trans-unit.source: . If you don’t like GitHub (for some reason) you’re welcome to send regular patches.
trans-unit.target: 。如果您由于某些原因不喜欢GitHub，欢迎发送常规补丁。

trans-unit.source: 4.x.x is the last version to support Python 2.7, and from the next major version (Celery 5.x) Python 3.6 or newer is required.
trans-unit.target: 4.x.x是最后一个支持Python 2.7的版本,从下一个主要版本(Celery 5.x)开始需要Python 3.6或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: Celery can run on a single machine, on multiple machines, or even across datacenters.
trans-unit.target: Celery可以在一台计算机上运行，​​也可以在多台计算机上运行，​​甚至可以跨数据中心运行。

trans-unit.source: Celery is usually used with a message broker to send and receive messages. The RabbitMQ, Redis transports are feature complete, but there’s also experimental support for a myriad of other solutions, including using SQLite for local development.
trans-unit.target: Celery通常与消息代理一起使用，以发送和接收消息。RabbitMQ，Redis传输功能齐全，但是还为其他许多解决方案提供了实验性支持，包括使用SQLite进行本地开发。

trans-unit.source: A Celery system can consist of multiple workers and brokers, giving way to high availability and horizontal scaling.
trans-unit.target: 一个Celery系统可以由多个工人和经纪人组成,让位于高可用性和横向扩展。

trans-unit.source: A more complete overview, showing more features.
trans-unit.target: 更全面的概述,展现更多的特色。

trans-unit.source: A single Celery process can process millions of tasks a minute, with sub-millisecond round-trip latency (using RabbitMQ, py-librabbitmq, and optimized settings).
trans-unit.target: 单个Celery进程每分钟可处理数百万个任务,往返延迟为亚毫秒(使用RabbitMQ、py-librabbitmq和优化设置)。

trans-unit.source: A task queue’s input is a unit of work, called a task, dedicated worker processes then constantly monitor the queue for new work to perform.
trans-unit.target: 任务队列的输入是一个工作单元，称为任务，专用的工作进程然后不断监视队列以执行新工作。

trans-unit.source: Almost every part of Celery can be extended or used on its own, Custom pool implementations, serializers, compression schemes, logging, schedulers, consumers, producers, broker transports, and much more.
trans-unit.target: Celery的几乎每个部分都可以自己扩展，使用，自定义池实现，序列化器，压缩方案，日志记录，调度程序，使用者，生产者，代理传输等等。

trans-unit.source: Available as part of the Tidelift Subscription.
trans-unit.target: 作为Tidelift订阅的一部分提供。

trans-unit.source: Be sure to also read the Contributing to Celery section in the documentation.
trans-unit.target: 确保还阅读了文档中的“ 贡献给芹菜”部分。

trans-unit.source: Celery also defines a group of bundles that can be used to install Celery and the dependencies for a given feature.
trans-unit.target: Celery还定义了一组捆绑包,可以用来安装Celery和特定功能的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Celery communicates via messages, usually using a broker to mediate between clients and workers. To initiate a task a client puts a message on the queue, the broker then delivers the message to a worker.
trans-unit.target: Celery通过消息进行通信,通常使用经纪人在客户和工人之间进行调解。为了启动一个任务,客户端会在队列中放入一条消息,然后经纪人将消息传递给工人。

trans-unit.source: Celery is a project with minimal funding, so we don’t support Microsoft Windows. Please don’t open any issues related to that platform.
trans-unit.target: Celery是一个资金最少的项目，因此我们不支持Microsoft Windows。请不要打开与该平台有关的任何问题。

trans-unit.source: Celery is easy to integrate with web frameworks, some of which even have integration packages:
trans-unit.target: Celery很容易与web框架集成,有些框架甚至有集成包。

trans-unit.source: Celery is easy to use and maintain, and does not need configuration files.
trans-unit.target: Celery易于使用和维护，不需要配置文件。

trans-unit.source: Celery is written in Python, but the protocol can be implemented in any language. In addition to Python there’s node-celery for Node.js, a PHP client, gocelery for golang, and rusty-celery for Rust.
trans-unit.target: Celery用Python编写，但是该协议可以用任何语言实现。除了Python外，还有Node.js 的node-celery，PHP客户端，golang的gocelery和Rust的rusty-celery。

trans-unit.source: Come chat with us on IRC. The #celery channel is located at the Freenode network.
trans-unit.target: 来在IRC上与我们聊天。该#celery通道位于Freenode的 网络。

trans-unit.source: Download the latest version of Celery from PyPI:
For discussions about the usage, development, and future of Celery, please join the celery-users mailing list.
trans-unit.target: 有关Celery的用法，发展和未来的讨论，请加入celery-users邮件列表。

trans-unit.source: Here’s one of the simplest applications you can make:
trans-unit.target: 这是您可以制作的最简单的应用程序之一：

trans-unit.source: If this is the first time you’re trying to use Celery, or you’re new to Celery 4.4 coming from previous versions then you should read our getting started tutorials:
trans-unit.target: 如果这是您第一次尝试使用Celery，或者您是以前版本的Celery 4.4的新用户，那么您应该阅读我们的入门教程：

trans-unit.source: If you are using Celery to create a commercial product, please consider becoming our backer or our sponsor to ensure Celery’s future.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用芹菜制作商业产品，请考虑成为我们的支持者或赞助商，以确保芹菜的未来。

trans-unit.source: If you have any suggestions, bug reports, or annoyances please report them to our issue tracker at https://github.com/celery/celery/issues/
trans-unit.target: 如果您有任何建议，错误报告或烦恼，请通过https://github.com/celery/celery/issues/向我们的问题跟踪器报告。

trans-unit.source: If you’re running an older version of Python, you need to be running an older version of Celery:
trans-unit.target: 如果您正在运行旧版本的Python，则需要运行旧版本的Celery：

trans-unit.source: It has an active, friendly community you can talk to for support, like at our mailing-list, or the IRC channel.
trans-unit.target: 它有一个活跃，友好的社区，您可以与我们联系以寻求支持，例如在我们的邮件列表或IRC频道中。

trans-unit.source: Language interoperability can also be achieved by using webhooks in such a way that the client enqueues an URL to be requested by a worker.
trans-unit.target: 语言互操作性也可以通过使用webhooks的方式来实现,这样客户端就会将一个URL报给工人请求。

trans-unit.source: Python 2.4 was Celery series 2.2 or earlier.
Support this project by becoming a sponsor. Your logo will show up here with a link to your website. [Become a sponsor]
trans-unit.target: 通过成为赞助者来支持该项目。您的徽标将显示在此处，并带有指向您网站的链接。[ 成为赞助商 ]

trans-unit.source: Task queues are used as a mechanism to distribute work across threads or machines.
trans-unit.target: 任务队列作为一种机制,用于在线程或机器之间分配工作。

trans-unit.source: Thank you to all our backers! 🙏 [Become a backer]
trans-unit.target: 谢谢我们所有的支持者！🙏[ 成为支持者 ]

trans-unit.source: The latest documentation is hosted at Read The Docs, containing user guides, tutorials, and an API reference.
trans-unit.target: 在最新的文档在阅读文档托管，包含用户指南，教程和API参考。

trans-unit.source: The Celery development version also requires the development versions of
trans-unit.target: Celery开发版还需要开发版本的。

trans-unit.source: The integration packages aren’t strictly necessary, but they can make development easier, and sometimes they add important hooks like closing database connections at
trans-unit.target: 集成包不是严格必需的，但它们可以使开发更容易，有时还添加了重要的挂钩，例如在以下位置关闭数据库连接

trans-unit.source: The last command must be executed as a privileged user if you aren’t currently using a virtualenv.
trans-unit.target: 如果您当前未使用virtualenv，则必须以特权用户身份执行最后一个命令。

trans-unit.source: This project exists thanks to all the people who contribute. Development of
trans-unit.target: 这个项目的存在要感谢所有作出贡献的人。开发

trans-unit.source: This project relies on your generous donations.
trans-unit.target: 这个项目有赖于您的慷慨捐助。

trans-unit.source: This software is licensed under the
Tutorial teaching you the bare minimum needed to get started with Celery.
trans-unit.target: 教你最基本的芹菜入门所需的教程。

trans-unit.source: Workers and clients will automatically retry in the event of connection loss or failure, and some brokers support HA in way of Primary/Primary or Primary/Replica replication.
trans-unit.target: 如果连接丢失或出现故障，辅助服务器和客户端将自动重试，并且某些代理以主/主或主/副本复制方式支持HA 。

trans-unit.source: You can install Celery either via the Python Package Index (PyPI) or from source.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过Python包索引(PyPI)或从源代码安装Celery。

trans-unit.source: You can install it by doing the following,:
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过以下方式进行安装,。

trans-unit.source: You can install the latest snapshot of these using the following pip commands:
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用下面的pip命令安装这些最新的快照。

trans-unit.source: You can specify these in your requirements or on the
trans-unit.target: 您可以在您的要求中或在网站上指定这些内容。

trans-unit.source: You should probably not use this in your requirements, it’s here for informational purposes only.
trans-unit.target: 您可能不应在需求中使用此功能，此处仅供参考。

trans-unit.source: You’re highly encouraged to participate in the development of

and thousands of other packages are working with Tidelift to deliver commercial support and maintenance for the open source dependencies you use to build your applications. Save time, reduce risk, and improve code health, while paying the maintainers of the exact dependencies you use. Learn more.
trans-unit.target: Tidelift还与其他数千个软件包一起为您用于构建应用程序的开源依赖项提供商业支持和维护。节省时间，降低风险并改善代码运行状况，同时向维护人员支付所使用的确切依赖项。学到更多。

trans-unit.source: command-line by using brackets. Multiple bundles can be specified by separating them by commas.
trans-unit.target: 命令行中使用括号来指定。可以用逗号将它们分开来指定多个捆绑。

trans-unit.source: file in the top distribution directory for the full license text.
trans-unit.target: 在顶级发行目录下的文件中获取完整的许可证文本。

trans-unit.target: 用于使用 Azure Cosmos DB 作为结果后端(使用

trans-unit.target: 用于使用Memcached作为结果后端(使用
